trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access encrypted data and memory.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取加密資料和記憶體的能力。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This permission is used to control the ability to encrypt data and memory using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory> classes.
trans-unit.target: 此權限用來控制加密資料和記憶體使用的功能<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission" /> class with the specified permission state.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定權限狀態，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates either `None` (fully restricted) or `Unrestricted` access to data and memory.
trans-unit.target: 會建立`None`（完全受限制） 或`Unrestricted`存取資料和記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission" /> class with the specified permission flags.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定權限旗標，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.%23ctor%28System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="flag" /> is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flag" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags" /> 值的有效組合。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 目前權限的複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: 複製的權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Copy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Copy%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data and memory protection flags.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料和記憶體保護旗標。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags" /> 值的位元組合。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the `Protect` and `Unprotect` methods of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory> classes can be used.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指定是否`Protect`和`Unprotect`方法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedData>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ProtectedMemory>類別可以用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Flags%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Flags%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags" /> 值組合。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a permission with a specific state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 透過 XML 編碼方式，重新建構具有特定狀態的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.FromXml%2A> method reconstructs a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> object from an XML encoding defined by the <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.FromXml%2A>方法重建<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>物件所定義的 XML 編碼方式<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.ToXml%2A> method to XML-encode the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>, including state information.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.ToXml%2A>方法，將 XML 編碼<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>，包括狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.FromXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.FromXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityElement" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityElement" /> is not a valid permission element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityElement" /> 不是有效的使用權限項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The version number of <paramref name="securityElement" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援 <paramref name="securityElement" /> 的版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: A permission to intersect with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: It must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both individual permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: 只有通過這兩個個別的使用權限的需求會通過交集。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Intersect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Intersect%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and does not specify a permission of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且不會指定與目前使用權限相同型別的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: A permission to test for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

trans-unit.source: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained in the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前權限在指定的權限中指定完全包含一組的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags.ProtectData> access is a subset of a permission for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags.AllFlags> access.
trans-unit.target: 例如，權限<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags.ProtectData>存取是權限的子集<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermissionFlags.AllFlags>存取。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and does not specify a permission of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且不會指定與目前使用權限相同型別的使用權限。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的使用權限為不受限制，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限和其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the permission, including state information.
trans-unit.target: 權限的 XML 編碼方式，包含狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.FromXml%2A> method to restore the state information from a <xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.FromXml%2A>方法，以還原狀態資訊從<xref:System.Security.SecurityElement>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.ToXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.ToXml%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: A permission to combine with the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

trans-unit.source: It must be of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

trans-unit.source: The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 若要呼叫的結果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Union%2A>權限所代表的所有作業，代表目前權限和指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the use of the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Union%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範使用<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission.Union%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission>類別。

trans-unit.source: The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and does not specify a permission of the same type as the current permission.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />，而且不會指定與目前使用權限相同型別的使用權限。
